item.title: The book Soirees, Sojourns & Stories details the most memorable moments of the Raffles narrative
item.description: Raffles Hotels & Resorts, a leader in luxury hospitality known for its iconic properties, has released Soirees, Sojourns & Stories. Created in partnership with Rizzoli New York, the 200-page slipcased book, Soirees, Sojourns & Stories by Natasha Fraser-Cavassoni, explores the development of Raffles’ heritage of elegance and exceptional service around the world. It covers the period from the opening of its flagship hotel in Singapore in 1887 to the recent debut of Raffles Warsaw in Poland.
